data.oai_dc:dc: The data are species climatic means (extracted from WorldClim database for all localities the species are reported to occur) and morphological means (21 linear skull distances: definitions of abbreviations are in the ReadMe file). Next are species residual phenotypic variance covariance matrices for which the effects of sex and locality were removed (see table S1 of article). The last data is a data frame that was used as entry on the function oubm.fit of the slouch R package.
evolutionary potential|lines of least evolutionary resistance|Rhinella granulosa species group|selection gradients|G-matrix
